name: SpaceWork Demo
description:
Player needs to play with alternative physics of electromagnets, electricity, gravity and various objects to reach the final destination. 

Any feedback and constructive criticism is welcomed, because the upcomming work on this project is just being decided.

(Game is in early demo state and is barely optimized, GTX 1050 and more powerfull graphics cards are recommended. If you are experiencing low performance, turn off the post-processing in the menu after you enter first level. ESC->Options->Post processing)
